name: thtr
description: cool weekend project with olivier desmoulin & jerome gangneux about theatre
author: Adrien Joly

scripts.convert: for f in $(find ./plays -name 'acte*.txt'); do node parse.js $f >${f%.txt}.json; done
scripts.apply-emoji: for f in $(find ./plays -name '*.json'); do node apply-emoji.js $f; done
scripts.test: node server.js & sleep 2; curl http://localhost:3000/api/plays | jq . >tests.log; cd plays; for f in *.json; do curl http://localhost:3000/api/play/${f%.json}/act/1 | jq . >>../tests.log; done; cd ..; kill $!
